txt.en: The time has come to challenge the Olog-hai champions of the Easterling army. If they can be convincingly defeated, the siege may be broken.
The Easterling army has been shattered
Drag down the banners and define your terms ([placeholder]/4)
Easterling banners line the stairs, each establishing a different term for the battle to take place under.
The Olog-hai champions must be defeated for the siege to be broken.
